nodes.text: Serving the Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps during the First Galactic Civil War, this Stormtrooper was stationed onboard the Death Star in 0 BBY where he was part of a patrol. He was the first to notice the four rebels Chewbacca, Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker, and Han Solo, who were trying to make it back to the Millennium Falcon. Before he could react, he was shot by Han Solo, causing the rest of the stormtroopers to flee.
